picks.text: More flexibility for app icon placement on the iPhone home screen
picks.full-pick-text: More flexibility for app icon placement on the iPhone home screen

picks.text: There are some design and navigation updates to the Settings app across multiple platforms
picks.full-pick-text: There are some design and navigation updates to the Settings app across multiple platforms

picks.text: There is no new hardware announced or released
picks.full-pick-text: There is no new hardware announced or released
picks.notes:
• Was just "announced" but Stephen actually made it riskier to better fit his intent with the pick.
  • An announcement about Vision Pro in more countries doesn't make this wrong.

picks.text: Notification summaries are provided by a new AI system
picks.full-pick-text: Notification summaries are provided by a new AI system

picks.text: There is a new system for changing the colors of icons on the home screen
picks.full-pick-text: There is a new system for changing the colors of icons on the home screen

picks.text: Apple mentions that it has created its own LLM
picks.full-pick-text: Apple mentions that it has created its own LLM
picks.notes: • Must be the term "large language model" or "LLM" in particular, but this could be in a session or the State of the Union keynote, not just the main event.

picks.text: visionOS 2 has keyboard passthrough when in an environment and it works with any keyboard, not just the ones Apple makes
picks.full-pick-text: visionOS 2 has keyboard passthrough when in an environment and it works with any keyboard, not just the ones Apple makes

picks.text: Apple shows a 'Siri Camera' (not official name) feature that lets you point the iPhone at something and use AI to understand what you're looking at
picks.full-pick-text: Apple shows a 'Siri Camera' (not official name) feature that lets you point the iPhone at something and use AI to understand what you're looking at
picks.notes: • Non-graded: this is also why the next iPhone will have a physical camera button

picks.text: Apple previews a new visionOS feature that puts overlays over the camera passthrough with information about objects in view
picks.full-pick-text: Apple previews a new visionOS feature that puts overlays over the camera passthrough with information about objects in view

picks.text: We do not see Sam Altman's face in the presentation
picks.full-pick-text: We do not see Sam Altman's face in the presentation

picks.text: Some AI features on the Mac require an M2 or later
picks.full-pick-text: Some AI features on the Mac require an M2 or later

picks.text: At least two of Apple's first-party apps escape iPad compatibility mode on visionOS to become full-blown native apps
picks.full-pick-text: At least two of Apple's first-party apps escape iPad compatibility mode on visionOS to become full-blown native apps

picks.text: "Improvements" to Stage Manager are announced
picks.full-pick-text: "Improvements" to Stage Manager are announced

picks.text: Something in iOS 18 picks up the UI used in the iOS 17 App picker in Messages
picks.full-pick-text: Something in iOS 18 picks up the UI used in the iOS 17 App picker in Messages

picks.text: Journal app comes to iPadOS
picks.full-pick-text: Journal app comes to iPadOS

picks.text: The next version of macOS is named Tahoe
picks.full-pick-text: The next version of macOS is named Tahoe
picks.notes: • Stolen from one of Myke's choices in the Upgrade Draft for the last 2 years.

picks.text: RCS is not spoken aloud in the keynote
picks.full-pick-text: RCS is not spoken aloud in the keynote
picks.notes: • An earlier draft of this pick was a risky pick that also specified that it would appear in the "bento box" slide specifically in the bottom left.

picks.text: Standby mode for iPadOS
picks.full-pick-text: Standby mode for iPadOS

picks.text: At least one of the 'Coming Soon' environments in visionOS 2 is removed
picks.full-pick-text: At least one of the 'Coming Soon' environments in visionOS 2 is removed

picks.text: Apple announces some new immersive video content coming to Vision Pro
picks.full-pick-text: Apple announces some new immersive video content coming to Vision Pro

picks.text: Apple announces an AI deal with Google
picks.full-pick-text: Apple announces an AI deal with Google
picks.notes: • Originally included the word "also" but that was confusing things.

picks.text: Vision Pro international availability is mentioned
picks.full-pick-text: Vision Pro international availability is mentioned

picks.text: Chatbot features from AI partners are available only to iCloud+ subscribers after a free trial
picks.full-pick-text: Chatbot features from AI partners are available only to iCloud+ subscribers after a free trial

picks.text: Some AI features will be region-locked
picks.full-pick-text: Some AI features will be region-locked

picks.text: Some new iOS 18 features will be exclusive to the iPhone 15 Pro line
picks.full-pick-text: Some new iOS 18 features will be exclusive to the iPhone 15 Pro line
picks.notes: • Was originally just "iPhone 15 line" but it was pointed out that the plain 15 phones have the same processor as the 14 Pro.

picks.text: Notes gets new features, such as math calculations and voice recording
picks.full-pick-text: Notes gets new features, such as math calculations and voice recording

picks.text: The next version of macOS is called Sequoia
picks.full-pick-text: The next version of macOS is called Sequoia

picks.text: Apple shows off the ability for Siri to control apps, but it's not launching this year
picks.full-pick-text: Apple shows off the ability for Siri to control apps, but it's not launching this year

picks.text: The calculator app comes to iPad
picks.full-pick-text: The calculator app comes to iPad

picks.text: The next version of Stage Manager supports more than 4 windows at once on some iPad models
picks.full-pick-text: The next version of Stage Manager supports more than 4 windows at once on some iPad models
picks.notes: • This would complete Federico's annual risky pick for the year as well. (Reuse of an annual pick is allowed in The Flexies.)

relevant-episodes.title: Connected #506: The Sun Did Not Shine in Favor of Me
